name: vscode-nesting-config
description: This is a config snippet making your file tree cleaner with the file nesting feature of VS Code.
author: Dennis Ollhoff <contact@nyxb.xyz>

scripts.ext:publish: nyxr ext:build && cd extension && bumping --commit --push --tag && vsce publish --no-dependencies
scripts.ext:pack: nyxr ext:build && cd extension && vsce package --no-dependencies
